pageContext.claim: “Yet the media and tech companies worked together to completely censor this information. Our country no longer has a free press. It is a press of suppression. It is a press where the truth will never come out.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump's comment offers the slander that there is no "free and fair press" and that it engages in suppression of news. The reality is that news organizations aim to confirm information -- such as allegations about Hunter Biden or election fraud -- rather than just report claims that may turn out to be false.
